batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND script.script_content.value rlike '\\w\+`\(\\w\+|-|.\)`\[\\w\+|\\s\]' AND script.script_content.value rlike '"\(\\\{\\d\\\}\)\{2,\}"\\s*-f' AND script.script_content.value rlike '\(?i\)\\$\\\{`?e`?n`?v`?:`?p`?a`?t`?h`?\\\}' AND NOT (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('${env:path}')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('it will return true or false instead')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('the function also prevents `get-itemproperty` from failing')) OR startswith(lower(script.file.path), lower('c:\\program files\\microsoft\\exchange server\\')) AND endswith(lower(script.file.path), lower('\\bin\\servicecontrol.ps1')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('`r`n'))))
